manuscript.title: ClearCase
manuscript.div:
This is a quick introduction to some of the most important ClearCase concepts.
Intro
[[What is ClearCase]]
[[What's a VOB]]
[[What's a branch]]
[[What is UCM]]
[[What's a stream]]
[[What's a view]]
[[How to make a view]]
[[How to make a stream]]
Common Issues
[[My view is missing]]!
[[I need a new stream]].
[[I need a new branch]].
[[I need many, many new branches]].
[[Local views]]
[[But I need to have local views]]!

[[UCM]]
